id,
title,
create_user_id,
create_time,

status,

user_realname,

mapper.update:
update resume
title = #{title},
create_user_id = #{createUserId},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId},
update_time = #{updateTime},
status = #{status},
recruitment_id = #{recruitmentId},
user_realname = #{userRealname},
phone = #{phone},
student_code = #{studentCode}
where id = #{id}
